name: Tip the Scale
description:
While exploring an ancient Egyptian tomb our hero has become trapped in an air-tight room filled with puzzles and traps. The only way out is to place enough treasure on the scale to open the door to the next chamber. It is rumored that one that makes it through all the rooms and finds the four canopic jars will gain entrance to the vast treasure room.

In this fast-paced puzzle game players must navigate 32 rooms avoiding bottomless pits, moving platforms, and other traps while finding treasures to place on the scale all before a timer runs out. Hidden within these 32 rooms are 4 canopic jars needed to enter the bonus level. The game also has eight achievements.
